description:
Limited Time Only
Until 01/06/2020, 00:00 AEST!

- Event Schedule (AEST)
May 31, 2020, 14:00-23:59
* Please note that the schedule is subject to change.

- Ninja-Gum
Use Ninja-Gum to blow bubbles that can be tossed at your foes, craft all sorts of weapons, and dash across stages.
The appearance and variety of your weapon will vary depending on the type of Ninja-Gum you use.

- Competitive Player
Take part in Battle Royale-style matches of up to 8 players and vie for supremacy with ninja around the world. The player who earns the most points over the course of the match will be declared the winner. Score points by defeating your opponents, obtaining items, destroying drones positioned across the stage, and more. Earn extra points by taking down your opponents with an IPPONâ€”impressive finishing techniques.

- Avatar
Choose from a host of distinctive avatar items and combine them as you see fit. You can stick to one brand for a consistent look, or mix and match to create a style all your own!


This version of Ninjala is the Ninjala Exclusive Ninja Club edition.
You can enjoy a subset of the features to be found in the release version, including online battles.
Please be aware that saved game data from this version cannot be transferred to the release version.
name: Ninjala Exclusive Ninja Club
intro:
An online action battle game featuring ninja and gum!
Assume the role of a modern-day ninja and take part in the Ninjala tournament!
